name: Roadworks Simulator
description: You are responsible for the streets and roads in your city. With so many people in a city, there is always the need for new living space, which has to be opened up with roads.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® Me / 2000 / XP / Vista / 7 /8 / 10 Processor: Intel or AMD with min. 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce®, AMD Radeon® with min. 128 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: would rate this game 4 out of 10  thought it would be much better then it is
